body: Yeah I bet this is Haitoku-sensei. It feels different because he's not working alone and a group work maybe. Even the comedic style is similar
@Jeanne same lmao the artstyle is really similar but i can kinda tell wheres different like the sweat and hair (idk what the hell those lines are so

The artist group name is Saya Products.
Saya has worked with several artists, but has not disclosed the names of their staff.
However, I agree with the opinion that this is very similar to  Haitoku sensei's work.
For a moment i thought this was Haitoku sensei's work
